import React, {useState, Fragment} from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import {connect} from 'react-redux'; const CreateProfile = props => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ company: '', website: '', location: '', status: '', skills: '', githubusername: '', bio: '', twitter: '', facebook: '', linkedin: '', youtube: '', instagram: '' }); const [displySocialInputs, toggleSocialInputs] = useState(false); const { company, website, location, status, skills, githubusername, bio, twitter, facebook, linkedin, youtube, instagram } = formData; const onChange = e => setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); return (

onchange(e)} /> Could be your own company or one you work for
onchange(e)} /> Could be your own or a company website
onchange(e)} /> City & state suggested (eg. Boston, MA)
onchange(e)} /> Please use comma separated values (eg. HTML,CSS,JavaScript,PHP)
onchange(e)} /> If you want your latest repos and a Github link, include your username
Tell us a little about yourself

)} Go Back
); }; CreateProfile.propTypes = { } export default CreateProfile
